<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H7560|רְשַׁם]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָשַׁם‎</span>] **verb** ==inscribe, note== (Late Hebrew ***id.***.; so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְשַׁם‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is loan-word [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xxix (1875), 327</sup> [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>137. 250</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Passive participle*** with art, as substantive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרָשׁוּם בִּכְתָב אֱמֶת‎</span> [[Dan.10.21|Dan 10:21]] ***that which is inscribed in the writing of truth***.
